bibl.title: Two poll-tax receipts from Tebtunis and some familiar figures
bibl.seg: Nikolaos Gonis, Two Poll-Tax Receipts from Tebtunis and Some Familiar Figures.

Receipts for laographia belonging to the family archive that chiefly consists of ostraca published in O. Tebt. Pad. I. - 1. P. CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 375. 157/158p. - 2. P. CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 302. Late January / early February 166p.
bibl.note: Receipts for laographia belonging to the family archive that chiefly consists of ostraca published in O. Tebt. Pad. I. - 1. P. CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 375. 157/158p. - 2. P. CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 302. Late January / early February 166p.
